name: IMDb Reborn
description: This is a dark, clean, and material version of IMDb. It includes a navigation bar that will always be on top for easy & fast navigation. Github: https://github.com/MrRobotjs/IMDb-Reborn =================== This style is still a work in progress, it will be continuously getting updates. The style will be finished over time but until then If you find something that I have missed, please let me know! =================== Your feedback and rating towards the style is highly appreciated! Check out more of my styles here.

discussions.name: Wow, you spent some time on this one! Fantastic!
Excellent theme with some minor issues
